# FocusToggle (component)

The FocusToggle puts the ParticipantTile in focus or removes it from focus.

## Import

```typescript
import { FocusToggle } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<ParticipantTile>
  <FocusToggle />
</ParticipantTile>
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" /%}

## Properties

| Property                                                | Type         | Description  |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ | ------------ |
| [participant?](./react/focustoggleprops.participant.md) | Participant  | _(Optional)_ |
| [trackSource](./react/focustoggleprops.tracksource.md)  | Track.Source |              |
